Hey it's me Destin welcome back to Smarter Every Day.
I'm at YouTube headquarters here in San Bruno California and we're gonna learn about two things today.
First, last week's video. I gave you some explosive high-speed video
and I asked you to analyze it. A French-speaking guy named Mr DuPont did it, he created a
simulation and you can actually see that the blast waves bounce off the bottle on the inside
and they coalesce to create a region of low pressure, and if you overlay the high-speed
imagery it perfectly matches, and you can see that that's where the low-pressure
is created and that's where you get cavitation. So if you want to see his model and his math,
go look at the link in the description, he actually did all the work, it's amazing. I've been invited to
